componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value:
• The Manage Products component is only available for Cases and/or Work Orders in an open status.
  • To review Associated Products navigate to the Associated Products Quick Links or the Related tab.
  • To update Associated Products reopen the Case and/or Work Order

componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value: This Work Order is not currently associated with a Technical Elevation. To elevate this Work Order, please click the Create Technical Elevation button at the top of the Work Order.

componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value:
The "Elevation team" receives notifications at key points of an elevation.


A Technical Elevation team consists of the following members: Primary & Secondary FAS, FSE, FSM, FAM, Case Owner’s Manager, Elevation Owner & Manager, Case & Work Order Owner, Regional Elevations teams RPS/DFS.

For Account Elevations, the list is the same and adds the Account Owner (TAM).


Additional members can be added to the elevation as Watchers (receive notifications) or Executive Summary Key Stakeholders (do not receive notifications but is for reporting).

componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value: This Work Order is not currently associated with an Account Elevation. To elevate this Work Order, please click the Create Account Elevation button at the top of the Work Order.

componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value:
The "Elevation team" receives notifications at key points of an elevation.


A Technical Elevation team consists of the following members: Primary & Secondary FAS, FSE, FSM, FAM, Case Owner’s Manager, Elevation Owner & Manager, Case & Work Order Owner, Regional Elevations teams RPS/DFS.

For Account Elevations, the list is the same and adds the Account Owner (TAM).


Additional members can be added to the elevation as Watchers (receive notifications) or Executive Summary Key Stakeholders (do not receive notifications but is for reporting).

componentInstanceProperties.value: Please ensure this Work Order is open and linked to a Business Issue Complaint case before elevating.
